title: WTB Matty or Cy Young Portait
author: CrazyDiamond

posts.post_title: WTB Matty or Cy Young Portait
posts.post_content:
Hello

With the help of a few board members i was able to grab a nice Walter Johnson and Ty Cobb portrait - Now i am looking to continue my portrait collection with Cy young or Mathewson 

Low Grade (1, 2 or Authentic) preferably SGC or PSA graded with nice eye appeal.  please PM me what you have and asking price

i will be looking to add other portraits as i decided to go after that subset - so if you have them i may be interested as well

Thanks!
